taskGroup.name: Process related task
taskGroup.intro: This cheat sheet provides the ideal definition of the key processes which should be modified by a company to be cloud compliant due to the migration process.

task.name: SLAMP - SLA Management Process Task
task.intro: The goal of SLA management process is to ensure that an agreed level of IT services is provide for all current IT services and that the future services are delivered to agreed achievable targets

task.name: IMRP - Incidence Management and Resolution Process Task
task.intro: The goal of the Incidence Management and Resolution process is to restore normal service operation as quickly as possible and minimize the adverse impact on business operations, thus ensuring that the best possible levels of service quality and availability are maintained.

param.name: path
param.value: IMRP - Incidence Management and Resolution Process Task.xml

task.name: MCRP - Monitor Customer Request Process Task
task.intro: The main objective of this process is to provide a unique point of contact between users and the provider of the services in order to act as the centre of all the service support.

param.name: path
param.value: MCRP - Monitor Customer Request Process Task.xml

task.name: CPMP - Cloud Provider Management Process Task
task.intro: The objective of this task is to manage and control the service provided for the cloud provider in order to contract the most appropriate one for the organisation´s requirements, and to monitor, measure and control that the agreement is fulfilled.

param.name: path
param.value: CPMP - Cloud Provider Management Process Task.xml

task.name: RAP - Roles Alignment Process Task
task.intro: This task is focused on the adaptation and creation of new roles in the organization due to the new business model. It is essential to define the roles and responsibilities within the organisation in order to cover all the activities created with the new business model. If new roles are necessary, these roles should have assigned activities and responsibilities, and those should be known by the people involved.

task.name: DP - Development process
task.intro: The main objective of this task is to develop SaaS applications

task.name: UMP - Update and Maintenance Process Task
task.intro: The objective of this task is to deploy releases into production and establish effective use of the service in order to deliver value to the customer and be able to handover to service operations.

param.name: path
param.value: UMP - Update and Maintenance Process Task.xml
